eu.cqse.check.framework.core

Class CheckInstance

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.cqse.check.framework.core.CheckInstance

  • public class CheckInstance
extends java.lang.Object
    A instance of a custom check. Multiple CheckInstances of one CheckImplementationBase subtype can exist in order to be executed in parallel by multiple worker threads (each CheckInstance is backed by a separate instance of the CheckImplementationBase subtype).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CheckInstance(CheckInfo checkInfo)
      Creates a new check instance with the given check info.

    • Method Summary

      Initializes the check.
      void initializeAndSetContext(ICheckContext context)
      Initializes the underlying check implementation (calls CheckImplementationBase.initialize()) and then sets the check context of the underlying check implementation to the given one.
      <T> void setOption(java.lang.String name, T value)
      Sets the option with the given name to the given value.
